effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage each.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage each.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage, then lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage each.

short_effect.sun_moon: Lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Lowers the user’s Attack and Defense by one stage after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense stats.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense stats.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user’s Attack and Defense stats.
